title: I have pixel 2 xl The screen randomly locks while is use many times ..and emergency calls only
content:
I have  pixel 2 xl 
The screen randomly locks while is use many times ...
Also ... 
There is No SIM Card error
Don't know why this happen 
I restarted the device ..but it didn't work
I bought a new SIM card ...it also didn't work ...
It just  work for 3_5 mins and then it shows no SIM card_ emergency calls only 

I have re-installed the sim card and re-booted the device with the same result.  Cellular connectivity is good for about 5 minutes and then drops.  The Mobile Data icon states, “No sim card detected”
Plz help hope you 'Google' can help solve out this problem
